body: Ntr is such a hassle. Like, if your gonna screw another dude, and not ask for forgiveness or reflect, your trash. And if your just gonna break up anyway, why cause the guy who did nothing wrong as much pain as possible? Instead of 'I don't think this relationship is gonna work out', my guy gets a sextape of his girl cheating. Not only that, she gets way too personal with it
NTR chapter was shitty as all NTR, but some over was really good
oh the 2nd last story is mis translated and miss a pre story too.
3-4th last story. hell no. this series didnt need an ntr. i thought the first story was ntr but  it became cute. but nope the 3rd to 4th last story. Hell no.
I like the office lady in the last chapter, the other stories are ok and that ntr story was trash.
This is the only manga that i approve fat bastard fucking a girl without raping or mindtrick or drug.
Your right. I’ve seen good story hentais but these are badly written. Trying to riled you up emotions with the dumbest plots

The worst part about these garbage ass tanks with these boring ass stories made to intentionally stir up the readers emotions is that alot of them have decent artwork with amazing covers. Imagine if we lived in a world where you had to buy the book just based off the cover art so many people's money would be wasted
I wish there were more like the first story, love the revenge ntr
"look at me, i'm a vanillafag with high moral ground on porn site and anyone who like NTR deserves to die". Typical.
This is gold tankubon for me. There is ntr, there is dominator become dominated. Feels good

Okay so my thought is that the material is NTR trash and people who like it are cucks who deserve to die. And no, it's definitely not something I would spend my hard earned euros on.
109-148 trash
The first chapter is revenge cheating. The second is fake-out/not really cheating. The fifth chapter is both the netorare/ugly bastard/mindbreak chapter that can go die in a fire.
